order_id_invalid: Order ID must be a valid number
one_order_at_a_time: You can only handle one order at a time
order_ready: Order marked as ready for delivery
all_items_not_picked: All items must be picked before marking as ready
barcode_not_in_order: Barcode does not belong to any item in the order
first_name_invalid: First name must be a string
last_name_invalid: Last name must be a string
email_invalid: Email must be a valid email
password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters
role_invalid: Role must be picker, qc, section_manager, cashier, cashier_manager, or finance_manager
store_id_invalid: Store ID must be a valid number
id_invalid: ID must be a valid number
sort_by_invalid: Sort by must be a string
order_by_invalid: Order by must be asc or desc
item_id_or_barcode_required: Item ID or barcode is required
item_already_picked: Item is already marked as picked
item_not_picked_yet: Item has not been marked as picked yet
barcode_valid: Barcode is valid and belongs to an item in the order
product_or_uom_required: Product ID or UOM ID is required
product_not_found: Product not found or not available in the store
items_required: At least one item is required
quantity_invalid: Quantity must be a valid number
price_invalid: Price must be a valid number
